name: Bloody Tower
description:
Bloody Tower is a paper-styled game, where you play as a soul, who is going to clean the dark dungeon from terrible monsters.

Gameplay

Play in the endless randomly generated rooms, filled with monsters, such as Golems and Eye-Monsters. Every monster has its own power (more monsters will be added with more updates).

Controls

W,A,S,D - movement

MOUSE - rotate

LMB - attack

R (when game over) - restart game

Developer

Game created by Daniel Oschepkov (Serious Duck Studios) using Unity
